title: High Bribery Incidence
description: In 2017, 56.1% of firms in Liberia reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, indicating a high level of bribery incidence.

title: Significant Net Forest Depletion
description: In 2021, Liberia experienced a net forest depletion equivalent to 17.54% of its GNI, highlighting significant environmental challenges.

title: Low Access to Handwashing Facilities
description: As of 2022, only 3.44% of Liberia's population had access to basic handwashing facilities, indicating poor sanitation infrastructure.

title: Low GDP per Capita
description: In 2023, Liberia's GDP per capita was 771.89 LCU, reflecting a low level of economic output per person.

title: Low GNI per Capita
description: In 2023, Liberia's GNI per capita stood at 722.19 LCU, indicating a low average income level.

title: High Percentage of Over-age Female Students
description: In 2017, 46.53% of female students in primary education were over-age, suggesting challenges in the education system.
